data.comment: The match has started at Mac3Park Stadion.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a first substitution, with Eliano Reijnders replacing Slobodan Tedic.
In the minute 26, The away team have replaced Lentini Caciano with Anco Jansen. This is the first substitution made today by Dick Lukkien.
The first-half has come to a close in Zwolle.
The second half has started at Mac3Park Stadion.
In the minute 46, John Stegeman is making the team's second substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with Pelle Clement replacing Yuta Nakayama.
Michael Chacon is replacing Marko Kolar for the away team.
Mustafa Saymak, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Dean Huiberts is the substitute for Zwolle.
In the minute 66, Simon Tibbling is on a sub for Nikolai Laursen for Emmen.
Clint Leemans is replacing Jesper Drost for Zwolle at Mac3Park Stadion.
Zwolle make their fifth substitution with Reza Ghoochannejhad replacing Mike Van Duinen.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
